definition: system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]

sentences.english: These traditional disciplines and the use of bamboo weapons remain alive today.
sentences.chinese: 这些传统学科以及竹制武器的使用一直延续至今。

sentences.english: The picture is the local people are working on the preparation of bamboo products.
sentences.chinese: 图片是当地人正在努力的准备的竹制品。

sentences.english: Bamboo flooring is made from quick growing bamboo stalks, found throughout most of Southeast Asia.
sentences.chinese: 竹制地板采用遍布东南亚的速生的竹竿制成。

sentences.english: Our company is a professional bamboo product manufacture with 14-year experience in China, offering over 1, 500 various kinds of bamboo products and our monthly output is up to 5 million pieces.
sentences.chinese: 我们是有十四年专业竹制品经验的中国制造商。

sentences.english: Our company is a professional bamboo product manufacture with 14-year experience in China, offering over 1,500 various kinds of bamboo products and our monthly output is up to 5 million pieces.
sentences.chinese: 我们是有十四年专业竹制品经验的中国制造商。

sentences.english: The company produces each kind of bamboo product is excellent in quality, many times obtains the title of honor.
sentences.chinese: 公司生产的各种竹制品品质优良，多次获得荣誉称号。

sentences.english: My preferred option is a bamboo chopping board.
sentences.chinese: 我比较喜欢的是竹制的砧板。

sentences.english: This paper is concerned with a new attempt at killing noxious insects in bamboo articles by the far-IR heating technique.
sentences.chinese: 用远红外烘烤技术治竹制品害虫，是一个新的尝试。

sentences.english: Bamboo bikes are a union of natural material and a highly innovative industry.
sentences.chinese: 竹制自行车与天然材料结合，是高创新工业。

sentences.english: We have confidence in your bamboo wares。
sentences.chinese: 我们对贵方的竹制品质量充满信心。

sentences.english: Bamboo products like this are also known for anti-bacterial and anti-fungal properties.
sentences.chinese: 这样的竹制产品也被认为是防菌产品。

sentences.english: He set to work making a bicycle out of bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 他开始着手做一辆竹制自行车。

sentences.english: Left or Right pointing angle shelf, made from bamboo. [link]
sentences.chinese: 竹制的架子，向左右延伸成角。

definition: thin bamboo strips used for basket weaving
moso bamboo (Phyllostachys edulis), used as timber etc
